evidence.text: BERNIECE: Maretha! You get up here and get ready to go so you be on time. Ain’t no need you trying to take advantage of company.
MARETHA: Mama, all the hair grease is gone.
BERNIECE: Here...run across the street and get another can. You come straight back, too. Don’t be playing around out there. And watch the cars. Be careful when you cross the street.
